name: SpaceBar Runner - Click and Run Game
name_original: SpaceBar Runner - Click and Run Game
description:
This is an endless runner game.

Adjust the stick length by press and hold the mouse button or screen and try to reach the other platform. 

Beware the falling rocks and try to collect the donuts.

Activate the slow speed and distance calculator features by using donuts.

Endless platforms are waiting for you, how far can you go?

Available on Google Play
